original_context: Madeline focuses on details in her artistic approach.
Madeline tells stories through her art.
Madeline can convey depth in her paintings.
Madeline does not develop symbolic languages.
Madeline cannot express emotions through her paintings.
Madeline does not capture the essence of her subjects in her work.
Madeline either focuses on details or sees beyond the surface, but not both, in her artistic approach.
All artists who portray personality can see beyond the surface and tell stories through their work.
Any artist who mixes media or makes abstract art can convey depth in their work.
Every artist who creates unique styles either portrays personality or develops symbolic languages (or both).
Any artist who uses vibrant colors or makes abstract art can express emotions through their work.
Every artist who inspires others either uses vibrant colors or captures the essence of their subjects in their work.
If Madeline is innovative, then she either inspires others or creates unique styles, but not both.

openai/gpt-4.1.mistake: No mistakes for the simple mapping cases. For the complex case with innovation and XOR, there is a subtle ambiguity in natural language, but the FOL uses exclusive-or correctly. None of the mappings are incorrect as FOL corresponds structurally to the intended NL meanings.
